name: ADF International
goal: ADF International is a not-for-profit international legal alliance of more than 2100 lawyers dedicated to the protection of fundamental human rights.
interests: Budget, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Equal Treatment Directive, Article 17 Dialogue, SDG negotiations for EU position.
